title: A Banker in paradise
creator_credit: Jack Gardiner, John Kingsford-Smith and Kingcroft Productions
brief_description: Produced for the Bank of NSW as part of its 150th anniversary celebrations. Shows the scenery and colourful life of Fiji and the activities of an officer providing banking services.
